UData\Widgets\WidgetOptions

A standard class for containing widget options.

Information
Implements

UData\Options

Widget Options

Most widgets will accept the following standard options. Some widgets accept specialized options depending on the widget and will be documented there.

Paremters
string string

Generally the inner HTML or data for the widget.

string class

The elements class attribute.

string style

The elements style attribute.

string id

The elements id attribute.

string href

The elements href attribute.

string other

A string that will be added to the element as an attribute verbatium.

Example:

//case 1
$string = new UIString();
$options = new WidgetOptions();
$options->string = "A string";
$options->style = "background-color:red";
$options->id = "myID";
$string->SetOptions($options);

//case 2
$string = new UIString(new WidgetOptions({
     'string'=>"A string",
     'style'=>"background-color:red",
     'id'=>"myID"
}));

//In either case the result is the same
$string->Display();
<span style='background-color:red' id='myID'>A string</span>
Functions
__construct
public function __construct (
Array $opts = null
)
Parameters
array $opts

Is an optional indexed array of option parameters

ToString
public function ToString ()

Outputs the widget properties in an array form. Thusly:

'index'=>value,...,...,
Returns
string

In the form mentioned above
